title: Nearing our goal of 1000 wiki entries...
content:
okay, so i guess no one else caught my post yesterday from [the original WikiBlast challenge thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20060222165222/http:/typophile.com/node/13459), so i’ll repost here:

_well, maybe only 6 or so months later… but we’re only 10 away from our goal of 1000 articles in the [typowiki](http://web.archive.org/wiki/typowiki). maybe we’ll break it today!_

c’mon, just 8 more! if each person who logs on today writes 1 article (or updates one that needs fleshing out) i think we’ll finally surpass our goal. let’s do it!

\* \* \* \* \*

hrant, your assignment (should you choose to accept it) is to touch on [bouma](http://web.archive.org/wiki/bouma) and [hybrid figures](http://web.archive.org/wiki/hybrid%20figures).
author: paul d hunt

comments.content:
OK Paul, I have made my contributions :-)

ChrisL
go Chris! i thought you were going to go ahead and finsih up the last 8 since no one else has jumped on my challenge yet. \>^P

How many left now? I can give it a shot.

ChrisL

there’s a little blurb on [the wiki start page](http://web.archive.org/web/20060222165222/http:/typophile.com/wiki/start) under the heading of Latest Wiki Entries that tells how many articles are currently in the wiki.

OK Dude, you’ve got your 1,000 now. Can I get an Amen?

ChrisL

I was trying to sync my 100th post with the 1,000 wiki posts but I came up one short so here is a lame post to do a Monk and even digit the numbers :-)

ChrisL
well, i was hoping more peeps would contribute, but thanks chris! now i can sleep soundly tonight.

Maybe more folks will go for the next marker?

You are welcome Paul.

ChrisL
Paul I wouldn’t know a Wiki if it walked up to me and bit me. I hope its not painful

\> _Paul I wouldn’t know a Wiki if it walked up to me and bit me._

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/wookie-vs-kid.jpg)

Norbert has returned! Even if he is looking serious and professional, he just can’t help himself :-)

ChrisL

Yeah.  
I’ve gotten really bored looking at my latest avatar.  
It doesn’t make any sense, let alone make me smile.

BTW-

here are seven more candidates to add in Typowookie:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/wookies_7.jpg)

I wonder if there is an OpenType feature for contextual Wookie selection? I would go ape over that :-)  
ChrisL

_Aaa aaaaraah. Aahhaa._

The wookie alphabet is an easy one, it only has 3 letters. A, h and r and only the A gets a capital.

Joe, the language seems to have more phonemes than three letters would cover. See the [Shyriiwook](http://web.archive.org/web/20060222165222/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Shyriiwook) entry on Wikipedia. Also note that Wookiee has two ee’s.

God, I gotta get a life.

Yeah, but Wookies pronounce “Wookie” as _Arrrahaa ahraara_.

Good thing there OT contextual Wookie ligs in AGG —

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/wookie_ligs.png)

How stable is the wiki section now? Because I once worked on the bouma wiki (with Forrest) but then it disappeared… Hey, maybe you can unearth it somehow?

hhp
I had written a few myself, one in particular on Otl Aicher. His name still shows up, but the content’s gone.

_Hey, maybe you can unearth it somehow?_

i tried, but i’m afraid it got zapped somehow.
